shareWaMsg: Your are looking for a great laundry ? https://sidewalk.agency/cleaners
presentationText1: Located in Ashdod, Laundry The Cleaners offers its services in the management of your clothes and linen.
presentationText2: We care about the satisfaction of our customers and offer them washing and ironing services adapted to their needs.
presentationText3: You no longer have to worry about your laundry, we take care of it for you and at unbeatable prices.
